root.name: Battlestar Galactica
root.description: OverviewBattlestar Galactica is a game based on the popular TV series. It was originally released on December 5, 2003 and is available on PlayStation 2, Xbox, and PC. Â GameplayIn an original story line taking place 40 years before the events chronicled in the remake TV show, players are cast in the role of a young William Adama, who would later become commander of the title starship. While piloting a Colonial Viper and an assortment of other fighters, players will embark on search-and-destroy missions to bombing runs, escorts, reconnaissance, and defensive operations to protect the Battlestar Galactica at all costs.
